snippet: The Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation committed $50 million on Wednesday to the fight against Ebola in West Africa, the largest sum it has ever committed to one outbreak.
lead_paragraph: The Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation committed $50 million on Wednesday to the fight against Ebola in West Africa, the largest sum it has ever committed to one outbreak.

headline.main: Gates Foundation Pledges $50 Million to Fight Ebola
headline.print_headline: Gates Foundation Pledges $50 Million to Fight Ebola
